title: Krak Users – Interviews #2
content:
We have so many rad skateboarders throwing photos and clips up everyday in the Krak app and we wanted to get to know them a little more through a little interview. These interviews were first published in the print Krak Mag #2 which came with KrakBox #2.
The 4 app users featured were Hugo, Kevin, Clyde and Kevin. Here we go!!

Hugo Pressard ♦ 


How old are you?
I’m 16.
Where are you from?
I’m from Joinville, Paris suburbs, France.
When did you start skateboarding?
I started in 2010.
What’s your favorite trick?
Hardflip.
Who’s your favorite skater?
Sean Malto.
What’s your favorite spot you ever skated?
Don’t really have one. Not Paris’ spots anyway.
And what’s the skate spot you never skated but dream about?
California spots.
How did you first hear about Krak and the App ?
I discovered Krak via Aurelien Giraud and his Pintodd Crew.
While talking about Krak, what’s your username?
hugo_pre
Alright Hugo, any shoutouts?
My brother Elliot, my friends from Cuz and my familly.


_

Kevin Ozcan ♦

 

How old are you?
I’m 16.
Where are you from?
I’m from Pantin, Paris suburbs.
When did you start skateboarding?
Skating since 2009.
What’s your favorite trick?
Treflip.
Who’s your favorite skater?
Max Geronzi, Shane O’neill.
What’s your favorite spot you ever skated?
Place de Créteil, legendary spot near Paris!
And your dream spot?
Macba.
How did you first hear about Krak and the App ?
via Aurelien Giraud who shared the app.
While talking about Krak, what’s your username?
KevinOzcan
Shoutouts?
My friends and familly, Parados skateboard and Pacific Wear Skateshop.


_

Clyde Boucher ♦

 

How old are you?
I’m 17.
Where are you from?
I’m from Montreal, Canada.
When did you start skateboarding?
Since 2009.
What’s your favorite trick?
Treflip and fs 360.
Who’s your favorite skater?
Boo Johnson.
What’s your favorite spot you ever skated?
I don’t have one really.
And what’s the skate spot you dream about?
Any schoolyard in Cali.
How did you first hear about Krak and the App ?
A friend of mine told me to try it!
While talking about Krak, what’s your username?
lordblacko
Shoutouts?
Benny crew, Soul Squad.


_

Kevin Wisleder ♦ 

How old are you?
I’m 17.
Where are you from?
I’m from Santa Monica.
When did you start skateboarding?
I started skating in paname (Paris), France, 3 years ago.
What’s your favorite trick?
Wallie.
Who’s your favorite skater?
Jon Dickson.
What’s your favorite spot you ever skated?
Stoner Skate Plaza.
And what’s the skate spot you dream about?
Stoner represent!
How did you first hear about Krak and the App ?
A year ago via Felix.
While talking about Krak, what’s your username?
kblueberry808
Shoutouts?
Yup shoutout Felix for showing me whats good.

_

Make sure to follow them on Krak! – Download the free app!
author: kev
